fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: You are aligned with a random faction, the town will be informed. You cannot align with the Town.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If you stay alive and reach the final three, the game automatically ends in your victory.
The faction does not have to be in the game, you could be everfrost aligned in a hallow match.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to carry the (FACTION) to victory.
